questions.questionText: Which note is located on the first line of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The treble clef lines spell EGBDF from bottom to top.
questions.explanation: The first line of the treble clef is E.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the first space of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The spaces of the treble clef spell FACE from bottom to top.
questions.explanation: The first space of the treble clef is F.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the second line of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The treble clef lines spell EGBDF from bottom to top.
questions.explanation: The second line of the treble clef is G.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the second space of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The spaces of the treble clef spell FACE.
questions.explanation: The second space of the treble clef is A.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the third line of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The treble clef lines spell EGBDF from bottom to top.
questions.explanation: The third line of the treble clef is B.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the third space of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The spaces of the treble clef spell FACE.
questions.explanation: The third space of the treble clef is C.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the fourth line of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The treble clef lines spell EGBDF from bottom to top.
questions.explanation: The fourth line of the treble clef is D.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the fourth space of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The spaces of the treble clef spell FACE.
questions.explanation: The fourth space of the treble clef is E.

questions.questionText: What note is located on the fifth line of the treble clef?
questions.hint: The treble clef lines spell EGBDF from bottom to top.
questions.explanation: The fifth line of the treble clef is F.

questions.questionText: Which note is located on the first ledger line below the treble clef?
questions.hint: This note is also known as middle C.
questions.explanation: The first ledger line below the treble clef represents middle C.
